full_text: Chicago! Our Lincoln Hall show tomorrow is sold TF out but they just released a handful of tix if you slept. Act NOW cuz this one is gonna be legendary. https://t.co/Bx7HBOVvMz

To make it clear: despite the recovery narrative presented we are 100% pro Harm reduction and do not shame anyone for drug use. Just trying to start dialogue about the disease of addiction, which drug use is a byproduct of.
